title: The Best of Both Worlds
description: Neil deGrasse Tyson takes us where no fan has gone before: an exclusive interview with Star Trek: TNG stars LeVar Burton and Brent Spiner at San Diego Comic-Con 2012.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
